title: Home
text:
Hello! I am a Graduate Research Assistant under the advisement of Dr. Matthew Kumjian at the Pennsylvania State University. My research focuses on the micro-physics of convective storm systems using remote sensing data. I have a broad interest in the spacial features of weather systems and seek to conduct sound and interesting science using novel research methods on remote sensing data.
On this site I keep a list of my publications, presentations, and my resume.
